arts.ttl: Coventry City boss makes worrying admission after letting Sheffield Wednesday 'off the hook'
arts.sum: Put to him that City were the architects of their own downfall by giving away the ball cheaply for both Wednesday goals, Robins agreed: “Yes, game management and the fact we didn’t start quickly enough was really disappointing because we needed to make the most of the fact that they played 24 hours later than us (in the week). We had 30 minutes at the end of the game when we looked like we were going to win it but they were still dangerous, still a threat and you’ve got to deal with that.

arts.ttl: Shea Charles snatches a stoppage-time winner for Sheffield Wednesday
arts.sum: The win made it three games unbeaten for the Owls.

arts.ttl: Coventry City player ratings after Sky Blues architects of their own downfall - Andy Turner
arts.sum: Jack Rudoni put City in front when he controlled a ball over the top from Liam Kitching before shrugging off his marker and drilling home from outside the box with a hard and low effort to beat the keeper in the 26th minute. The Owls, however, pulled level in first half stoppage time when Kitching gave the ball away, resulting in a swift counter attack with Jamal Lowe playing Djeidi Gassama in on the right to beat Ben Wilson at his near post in what was a really poor goal to concede just before half-time.

arts.ttl: Coventry City v Sheffield Wednesday live updates and team news from the CBS Arena
arts.sum: Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group. The Sky Blues go into today's game with renewed confidence following Tuesday night's much-needed 3-0 win over Blackburn Rovers - the perfect pick-me-up after a dreadful display at Leeds - while the Owls travel for their second away match in a row, having drawn 0-0 at Bristol City on Wednesday night.

arts.ttl: EFL pundit makes Adi Viveash point as Coventry City look to pick up form
arts.sum: Don Goodman admits he’s “massively” surprised by Coventry City’s early season form but insists fans need not “panic” just yet, confident that the Sky Blues will start to pick up and push at the top end of the division. “I’m massively surprised by Coventry City’s form and attacking performances - but you must apply rationale and not panic,” said Goodman, speaking to Grosvenor Sport.

arts.ttl: Ihiekwe in: Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI to face Coventry City
arts.sum: The latest Sheffield Wednesday team news as Danny Rohl's side gear up to face Coventry City in the Championship. The post Ihiekwe in: Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI to face Coventry City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Fankaty Dabo hails 'crazy' Coventry City support that helped him through darkest days in football
arts.sum: The former favourite has recently joined Scottish Championship side Raith Rovers as a free agent, signing an initial short-term deal until January, and revealed he already sees similarities between the club’s support and the fans at Coventry City, many of whom still look out for him to this day, some 16 months after leaving the club following the play-off final defeat to Luton Town at Wembley Stadium. And when he missed the play-off final penalty that denied the Mark Robins’ men the chance of promotion to the Premier League last year, the City faithful rallied round with support to drown out the racist abuse directed his way.

arts.ttl: Ben Wilson makes Coventry City exit admission and addresses Sky Blues contract
arts.sum: Asked if he thought he’d be looking for a new club when he ended last season as second choice behind Brad Collins amid talk of a new keeper being sought in the summer, he said: “Yes, obviously there were rumours of a new goalkeeper coming in and I knew I was number two, not getting in last season and in my head I thought, ‘yep, I’m away.’ “I came in at the start of the season not knowing what my future held at Coventry City,” admitted the bubbly character, “but I got my head down and worked hard, and have been rewarded for that, so I am absolutely buzzing for it.”

arts.ttl: Mark Robins makes Coventry City goalkeeper 'first' claim as competition hots up between the posts
arts.sum: The Sky Blues boss has added new signings to the position in successive summers, with Brad Collins signing last year and Oliver Dovin joining from Sweden in July as the released Simon Moore joined Sunderland on a free transfer. Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group.

arts.ttl: Coventry City bogey side Preston North End suffer striker blow after eight match biting ban
arts.sum: Preston North End have suffered a striker blow ahead of the forthcoming game against Coventry City after Milutin Osmajic has been slapped with an eight-game ban by the FA for biting Blackburn Rovers defender Owen Beck. “The Montenegro international has been sanctioned after admitting he had committed an act of violent conduct around the 87th minute of the recent Sky Bet Championship match against Blackburn Rovers.
